title: Various Veda Links.
describe: A collection of hymns from around the RigVeda

agni.title: Agni takes from Heaven and Earth.
agni.desribe: Vaiśvānara the Deva, at the sun's setting, hath taken to himself deep-hidden treasures: Agni hath taken them from Earth and Heaven, from the sea under and the sea above us.

agni.title: What did Indra and Soma give Agni?
agni.desribe: Thy vital parts I cover with thine Armour: with immortality King Soma clothe thee. Indra give thee what is more than ample, and in thy triump. May the Devas be joyful.
